title: George Washington Memorial Parkway: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger       Are you ready to join the ranks of the National Park Service Junior Rangers? Junior Rangers explore, learn about, and protect national parks. They wear a special badge that they earn by proving that they know their national park and taking the Junior Ranger pledge. You can become a Junior Ranger by completing one of the activities described below.  Â    Download an Activity Book You can earn a Junior Ranger badge by downloading and completing one of these two books. Fort Hunt Park Junior Ranger Book Let's Move Outside Junior Ranger Book Mail completed books to: GWMP Junior Rangers 700 George Washington Memorial Parkway McLean, VA 22101
